concept.title: What is addition?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is addition?

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of adding numbers, you must know what adding is. The term "addition" represents a mathematical operation. Addition allows you to find the combined total of two numbers.
You use the plus (+) button to express the addition operation in CohnCalc.
In the addition process, you take a number and combine it with another number.
